tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_logframe_category AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, max(acv.category_value) AS logframe_category, con.id AS indicator_connection_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator_values val, amp_category_value acv, amp_category_class acc WHERE val.ind_connect_id = con.id AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text AND val.ind_val_category=acv.id AND acv.amp_category_class_id=acc.id AND acc.keyname::text = 'logframe'::text GROUP BY con.activity_id, con.id;
